title: Data Science Manager - Marketing
overview: The Data Science Manager - Marketing position at Spotify involves leading the Marketing Analytics team, providing analytical support to the global Brand Marketing team, and leading analytics engineering projects for the Marketing and Consumer Insights (MCI) team.

extras.title: What you'll do
content: Partner with Marketing leadership in strategy development, goal setting and budget planning
Perform analyses on large sets of data to extract actionable insights that will drive decisions around our global marketing investments

Provide end-to-end campaign support, from goal setting and measurement plan development, to in-campaign performance insights and optimization recommendations, and post-campaign evaluation and recommendations
Define experimentation roadmap to identify new growth opportunities for our marketing investments

extras.title: Who you are
content: Intellectually curious, open-minded, and enjoy working in a fast changing environment
A natural communicator, who focuses just as much on the delivery and the ‚Äúso what‚Äù of your insights, as you do on the technical craft of extracting them

extras.title: Where you'll be
content: This role is located in the New York Tri-state area or east coast of the United States
